etymons.notes: cf. MEA nhr, SL 894: to shine; cf. Arab. nwr II, Wehr 1008f.: to light, illuminate, fill with light, furnish with lights

Infectum.text: an=naʕime d-aw=walayat ko-minawhri ʻdie Stadtkinder werden helle, klugʼ; 784;
